document.full_text: tom durkin, who has called the kentucky derby 13 times, said he did not renew his contract with nbc because of the anxiety the race had caused.
document.title: panic of final stretch stills voice of triple crown
lines_and_colors: tom durkin, who has called the kentucky derby 13 times, said he did not renew his contract with nbc because of the anxiety the race had caused.
